name: Not So Shrimple
description:
Deep in the Illinois Caverns, an Amphipod is searching for their most prized possession - a delicious Fig! Help them leave their roots and reach the top!

Made for Global Game Jam 2023

Credits: 

Rasmus - All 2D Assets + Animation

Tom - All 3D Assets + Texturing, Game Title, Audio Editing

Cat - Programming
